To Prevent Burns
■Wear the special gloves, apron,
and face shield when handling
oil.
■Don't touch hot oil or drop
things in it too forcefully.

To Prevent Fires
■Put the oil in the vat before
starting the frier.
■Calibrate the fried and check
the high limit switch.

To Prevent Fires
■Make sure the exhaust fan is
on before using the frier.
■Make sure to clean the grease
pan in the frier duct.
